definitions.text: an additional charge (as for items previously omitted or as a penalty for failure to exercise common caution or common skill)
charge an extra fee, as for a special service
rip off; ask an unreasonable price

examples: The air raids had surcharged the emergency wards

definitions.text: print a new denomination on a stamp or a banknote

examples: The air was surcharged with tension

definitions.text: place too much a load on
show an omission in (an account) for which credit ought to have been given
